SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.marzapower.loggable
Annotation Type Loggable

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Loggable

This interface will define a class that can access the global logging capabilities. You can force a class to log using a specific Class type Logger, or you can let the class use its default Logger.

Also, you can force the log level of your class using this annotation, despite of the global log4j settings.

Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.Class<?> clazz
          This parameter defines the Class to be passed to the Logger.getLogger(Class) method.
 boolean exclude
          This parameter defines if the class has to be excluded from the logging mechanisms
 java.lang.String loggerName
          This parameter defines the name of the logger to be used by the class.
 Loggable.LogLevel logLevel
          This parameter defines the default log level required for logging.
 

loggerName

public abstract java.lang.String loggerName
This parameter defines the name of the logger to be used by the class. It overrides the parameter specified with clazz().

Default:
""

clazz

public abstract java.lang.Class<?> clazz
This parameter defines the Class to be passed to the Logger.getLogger(Class) method. It is overridden by the loggerName() parameter, if present.

Default:
java.lang.Object.class

exclude

public abstract boolean exclude
This parameter defines if the class has to be excluded from the logging mechanisms

Default:
false

logLevel

public abstract Loggable.LogLevel logLevel
This parameter defines the default log level required for logging. If Loggable.LogLevel.LOG4J is passed, the class will log with the default log level configuration of log4j.

Default:
com.marzapower.loggable.Loggable.LogLevel.LOG4J
